description: Probably was a big orgy at his mansion. You know these celebrities and famous people do that all the time. It’s called Pandora’s Box where they wear the weir masks and costumes. You guys ever watch that show “The Masked Singer”? That’s the same type of stuff they wear to those weird parties. You see at the end when she said she’s in trouble? Yeah I bet you are #hollyweirdisevil
